name: The Family / The Household (家人, Jiā Rén)

core_meaning.legge_1899_public_domain: For (the realisation of what is taught in) Kiâ Zăn, (or for the regulation of the family), what is most advantageous is that the wife be firm and correct.
core_meaning.normalized_summary: Right order in the household. Roles are clear, speech is sincere, discipline is real but not cruel, and the inner management of the home is steady and correct. When the home is regulated like this — beginning with integrity in the 'inside' position — security, prosperity, and authority naturally extend outward.

translations.text: The first NINE, undivided, shows its subject establishing restrictive regulations in his household. Occasion for repentance will disappear.

lines.normalized_meaning: Set boundaries early. Clear rules at home prevent future regret. Kindness without structure falls apart; structure with conscience keeps the house clean.

translations.text: The second SIX, divided, shows its subject taking nothing on herself, but in her central place attending to the preparation of the food. Through her firm correctness there will be good fortune.
六二：無攸遂，在中饋，貞吉。

lines.normalized_meaning: Hold the center and do the real work. Humble, consistent service — feeding, maintaining, supporting — is powerful, and it brings blessing when done with steady integrity.

translations.text: The third NINE, undivided, shows its subject (treating) the members of the household with stern severity. There will be occasion for repentance, there will be peril, (but) there will (also) be good fortune. If the wife and children were to be smirking and chattering, in the end there would be occasion for regret.
九三：家人嗃嗃，悔厲吉，婦子嘻嘻，終吝。

lines.normalized_meaning: Strict discipline at home can feel harsh, and you may regret how hard you come down. But total laxity — everyone giggling and unchecked — rots the household. Loving firmness beats indulgence.

translations.text: The fourth SIX, divided, shows its subject enriching the family. There will be great good fortune.

lines.normalized_meaning: The work done ‘inside’ the home creates actual abundance. Quiet, skillful management brings prosperity and large-scale good fortune.

translations.text: The fifth NINE, undivided, shows the influence of the king extending to his family. There need be no anxiety; there will be good fortune.

lines.normalized_meaning: Right authority starts at home. When leadership is real and benevolent, it calms the household. You don’t have to worry — alignment itself brings good fortune.

translations.text: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows its subject possessed of sincerity and arrayed in majesty. In the end there will be good fortune.

lines.normalized_meaning: At the peak, true authority is both trustworthy and awe-inspiring. When honesty and dignity are visible, the ending is fortunate.
